document_data.mainbody:
Caravan Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Caravan Street was located in the northeast section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The road originated on the southeast side of Caravan Court where it branched south. Caravan Street continued south through the Southern Ward before ending on the Specterwalk. The road was intersected by Olaims Cut, Robins Way, Tilmans Lane, and Tulmasters Street.
The Redbridle Stables was located on the northern section of Caravan Street on the east side.
